lead_paragraph: Champion Novak Djokovic was unable to draw much support from the crowd at Rod Laver Arena during his 6-1 6-2 3-6 6-3 semi-final win over sentimental favourite Roger Federer on Thursday, but the Serb found vital friends in the weather and the net-cord.

headline.main: Devastating Djokovic Leaves Rod Laver Arena Crowd Cold
headline.print_headline: Devastating Djokovic Leaves Rod Laver Arena Crowd Cold
